name: Pian Zhen

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increases ATK by **20%** and resistance to cold by **40%**. To activate, equip at least **2** cold weapons. The effect of this kit works in the extra weapon box. It does not stack with other cold resonance or cold reaction effects, with cold resonance taking priority.

weaponEffects.title: Ice Crusher - Swift Cut
weaponEffects.description: When **Pian Zhen** is equipped, any weapon's discharge skill will deal **400%** * Frost ATK + **6.7%** of your Max HP + **240%** * sum of your elemental resistances + **800%** * your Crit Damage worth of damage to nearby targets. For every **0.5** seconds you are in combat, the next Swift Cut's damage will be increased by **1x**, up to **30** times. If there is more than one Swift Cut, the maximum value is used. Swift Cut's damage is considered that of a discharge skill. If equipped with at least **1** Volt/Physical/Flame weapon, the Swift Cut damage multiplier is increased to **2.5x**. Ice Crusher is not affected by damage boosting effects other than Titan equipment rare attributes, and does not trigger additional attack effects.

advancements: In **Martial Artist** style, each time **Pian Zhen** expends **3** or more stacks of **Inner Strength**, **1** stack of **Inner Strength** is returned, the wanderer's final damage is increased by **5%**, and **Pian Zhen's** normal and dodge attacks' damage is increased by **50%** for **30** seconds. In **Marauder** style, each time **Pian Zhen** expends **3** or more stacks of **Battle Spirit**, **1** stack of **Battle Spirit** is returned, and the wanderer's final damage is increased by **5%** for **15** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

In **Martial Artist** style, if you don't get a stack of **Inner Strength** within **4** seconds, you will gain **2** stacks next time (instead of 1). In any form, when **Pian Zhen** consumes **3** or more stacks of **Inner Strength** or **Combat Spirit**, the wanderer will restore **10%** of their Max HP (**20%** when solo). This effect has a cooldown of **8** seconds in **Marauder** style, and no cooldown in **Martial Artist** style.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

After **Pian Zhen** consumes stacks of **Inner Strength** or **Battle Spirit**, gain the ability to block lethal damage 1 time and subsequently restore **20%** ​​of your Max HP (unavailable in Apex League), or **40%** in solo play. This effect can only trigger once every **60** seconds.

In **Martial Artist** style, **Pian Zhen's** normal and dodge attacks' damage is increased by **60%**, and after consuming stacks of **Inner Strength**, final damage is increased by **10%** for **30** seconds. In **Marauder** style, after consuming stacks of **Battle Spirit**, final damage is increased by **15%** for **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Punching
abilities.description: While on the ground, use a normal attack to deliver 6 consecutive punches. If in **Martial Arts** or **Marauder** form, pressing normal attack after dodging triggers the 4th hit quickly. The 5th hit in **Martial Arts** form freezes the target for 2 seconds, dealing **270% ATK + 14** damage per second for 8 seconds (not effective in Apex League and on bosses).

abilities.name: Air Punch
abilities.description: Air attack x6, expending stamina. Use in Martial Arts/Marauder style.

abilities.name: Forest Breaking Swallow
abilities.description: When on the ground, use the first to third general attacks and hold the general attack button to trigger Forest Breaking Swallow. Deals **128.3% ATK + 7** damage and absorbs nearby targets. Then deals **299.3% ATK + 16** damage to nearby targets, knocking them back. Can only be released in **Martial Artist** form. After triggering Cloudbreak, tapping the general attack triggers Forest Breaking Swallow.

abilities.name: Snake Dance in the Sky
abilities.description: On the ground, use fourth to fifth general attacks, hold general attack to trigger. Deals **153.9% ATK + 8** to nearby targets, suspending them. Can only be used in **Martial Artist** style. After using Forest Breaking Swallow, press and hold normal attack to trigger.

abilities.name: Frosty Sky
abilities.description: In the air, after first to sixth normal attacks, press and hold normal attack to trigger. Throws a weapon, dealing **671.5% ATK + 35** to nearby targets. Can be used in **Martial Artist** or **Marauder** styles.

abilities.name: Cloudbreak
abilities.description: Press and hold normal attack while in the air, climbing, reverse jump attacking, or using the jetpack to trigger. Deals **303.2% ATK + 16** to nearby targets and knocks them down upon landing. Can be used in **Martial Artist** or **Marauder** styles.

abilities.name: Cycle of Life
abilities.description: Press and hold normal attack to trigger. Attracts nearby targets, consumes stamina, and grants Hyperbody. Can be used in **Martial Artist** or **Marauder** styles.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodging in **Martial Arts** style grants **5** seconds of Hyperbody.

abilities.name: Mountains and Sea
abilities.description: After dodging, press the normal attack button during a short window to use. Deals **362.5% ATK + 19** to nearby targets. Can be used in **Martial Artist** or **Marauder** styles.

abilities.name: Tempest
abilities.description: After dodging while holding a directional key, press the normal attack button during a short window to use. Deals **342% ATK + 18** to nearby targets. Can be used in **Martial Artist** or **Marauder** styles.

abilities.name: Offense & Defense
abilities.description: Pian Zhen has two styles: **Martial Artist** and **Marauder**. Choose one in Settings; can't switch in combat. **Martial Artist:** + **40%** normal & dodge attack damage. Using normal/dodge attacks **3** times grants **1** stack of Inner Strength (up to 10 stacks, 1 every 2 sec). Out of combat, stacks are lost. Marauder: Hitting a target grants Momentum, gaining **1** stack of Battle Spirit every **0.8** sec for **60** sec (up to 15 stacks). Out of combat, stacks are lost. Passive: Frosty Air - Ignore **30%** target's frost resistance (works in the background).

abilities.name: Abyssal Dive
abilities.description:
Deals damage equal to **2730%** of ATK + **144** to the target, cooldown **15** seconds. **Pian Zhen** consumes up to **5** stacks of **Inner Strength**. For every **1/2/3/4/5** stack(s) consumed, increase the damage of Abyssal Dive by **1.2/1.5/2.1/2.8/3.7** times.

After casting Abyssal Dive, frost damage is increased by **20%** for **30** seconds.After using Abyssal Dive, gain **2** dodge attempts.Abyssal Dive can only be used in **Martial Artist** style. Building **5** stacks of **Inner Strength** will reset the cooldown of Abyssal Dive.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Deals damage equal to **2730%** ATK + **144** to the target, cooldown **15** seconds.**Pian Zhen** consumes up to **5** stacks of **Battle Spirit** when using any weapon skill during **Momentum**. For every **1/2/3/4/5** stack(s) consumed, deal and additional **242%/503%/1049%/2351%/3930%** of ATK damage, and an additional **270%** of ATK + **14** per second for **5** seconds to nearby targets.When using any frost weapon skill, gain **2** seconds of Hyperbody. War Cry can only be used in **Marauder** style.

abilities.name: Tiger's Step
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge*** is full or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** upon switching to this weapon and deal damage equal to **2,394%** of ATK + **126** and **strongly suspend** them.Damage immunity lasts for **2.6** seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).Tiger's Step can only be used in **Martial Artist** style.

abilities.name: Reactive
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge*** is full or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** upon switching to this weapon and deal damage equal to **2,394%** of ATK + **126** to nearby targets and **strongly suspend** them.Damage immunity lasts for **2.6** seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).A successful hit will increase frost damage by **20%** for **30** seconds and grant **Momentum**. Using a discharge skill while **Pian Zhen** is the current weapon will recover **1000** weapon charge, up to once every **10** seconds. Reactive can only be used in **Marauder** style.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for Yulan main dps due to her long on-field time

recommendedMatrices.name: Lyra
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for Yulan main dps due to her long on-field time

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for both damage and shatter(lower value than Lyra and Samir)

recommendedMatrices.name: Yulan
recommendedMatrices.description: Extremely valuable matrice set all around

recommendedMatrices.name: Icarus
recommendedMatrices.description: Lower value matrice set than Yulan however provides straight elemental damage buffs
